name: Monster Dish
description:
Monster Dish is a cooking simulation party game where players must improvise dishes with the available ingredients and do as many creations as possible before time runs out. But be careful! The wrong combination may result in an ABOMINATION. 

Game Design & UX - Gabriela Mendes 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/gabrielabraga3d/

Programing - Hana Vargas

https://hana094.itch.io/

Art & Animation - Jimena Fernández

https://ookamijime.artstation.com/

Music & Sound - Monica Lyrae
https://www.monicalyrae.com/music
